post.description: Use this endpoint to request upload link and file id. Once you initiate a file upload, you will receive an upload link. Upload link will expire after 300 seconds. You can use it to upload file in chunks. After you finish uploading, attach the file id you received earlier where you want to use the file. Remember not to attach any custom authentication headers to the link you receive as this is handle by the cloud service provider.

info.title: Learnille Server Documentation
info.description:
# Welcome to Learnille API

Learnille is an innovative e-learning platform designed to connect learners and educators in a dynamic, interactive environment.

## Overview

This API provides access to Learnille's core functionalities, enabling developers to integrate our e-learning features into their applications or build upon our platform.

### Key Features

- **Video Calls**: Powered by GetStream for high-quality, real-time video interactions.
- **Live Chat**: Utilizes Socket.io for instant messaging capabilities.
- **Real-time Notifications**: Implemented with Socket.io for timely updates.
- **Interactive Comments**: Uses Server-Sent Events (SSE) for live comment feeds.
- **Secure Payments**: Integrated with Paystack for smooth and secure transactions.

## Getting Started

To begin using the Learnille API:

1. Sign up for a Learnille developer account
2. Obtain your API credentials
3. Review our documentation for endpoint details
4. Start making API requests!

## Authentication

Most endpoints in this API require authentication. We use bearer token authentication:

```
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_TOKEN
```

Include this header in your requests to authenticated endpoints.

## Rate Limiting

To ensure fair usage and maintain service quality, we implement rate limiting:

- Time Window: 30 seconds (30000 ms)
- Request Limit: 5 requests per window

Exceeding these limits will result in a 429 (Too Many Requests) response.

## Websocket Connections

For real-time features like chat and notifications, you'll need to establish a websocket connection. We use Socket.io for this purpose. Connection details can be found in the respective sections of our documentation.

## Server-Sent Events

Our comment system utilizes SSE for live updates. To implement this in your application, you'll need to set up an EventSource to listen for these events.

## Need Help?

If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out through the designated communication channels.

Happy coding with Learnille!
